dynamo.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a machine that changes some other form of power directly into electricity
dynamo.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: bicycle lights powered by a dynamo
dynamo.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who is excited about what they do and who puts a lot of energy into it
dynamo.translation[0].definitions[2].def: something that has a strong effect on something else, and that makes things happen
dynamo.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Oil is the dynamo of the country’s economy.
